EmailTemplate.name: Completed Alchemy Core Training
EmailTemplate.subject: Completed Alchemy Core Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations on successfully completing the Alchemy Core Training! This is a big step in jumpstarting your solar business with Palmetto.
We just wanted to take a minute to point out some other learning/training resources we have in Alchemy. Our goal is to give you the knowledge and confidence you need to succeed as quickly as possible.
1) Explore all relevant information pertaining to your market, approved utilities, financial products, and Palmetto processes at https://intercom.help/alchemysupport
2) See all Live Alchemy Webinars and Training available at https://intercom.help/alchemysupport/tutorials/alchemy-webinars-and-training-calendar
If you have any questions along the way, please feel free to contact the Alchemy Success Team via the "Chat" feature (green bubble) on the bottom right hand corner in the Alchemy platform.
You can also request a one on one training or coaching session with one of our Alchemy Success Coaches through this feature.
Alchemy Success Team
